original_text: In the place where they kill the burnt offering they shall kill the guilt offering, and its blood shall be thrown against the sides of the altar.
korean_text: 번제물을 잡는 곳에서 속건제의 번제물을 잡을 것이요 제사장은 그 피를 제단 사방에 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: In the place where they kill the burnt offering
they shall kill the guilt offering
and its blood shall be thrown against the sides of the altar.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 피는 제단의 사면에 뿌려질 것입니다
